author: Anonymous Atom
title: Arrange-Images - beside/align "bottom" ?
question: I used beside/align "bottom" instead of beside in the check-expects for arrange-images and layout-images, but I got marks off for test validity. In an exam scenario, should we just stick with what's simpler unless specified, since all the starters will be entirely autograded? (except for style rules)
instructor_answer: During the exam you should follow any examples we give you and keep it simple. That’s what the autograder is looking for.
